scripts.startRinkeby: truffle migrate --network rinkeby --reset && truffle run verify ERC20Generator --network rinkeby
scripts.startEthMainnet: truffle migrate --network mainnet --reset && truffle run verify Migrations USDT RedToken BlueToken ERC20Generator --network mainnet
scripts.startBscTestnet: truffle migrate --network bscTestnet --reset && truffle run verify Migrations USDT RedToken BlueToken ERC20Generator --network bscTestnet
